message: This offer is based on the initial value of the money. I propose a division where I receive 60% and you receive 40%. Please consider this fair split.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise considering the initial value of the money.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decrease in value of the money.
